caption: An upbeat ska punk track with bouncy offbeat guitar, punchy brass section, and energetic male vocals. Features fast tempos, walking bass lines, and an infectious energy that gets crowds moving and singing along.
lyrics:
[Intro]

Pick it up!

[Verse 1]
Monday morning alarm goes off
Boss is yelling had enough
Bills are piling traffic's bad
But I refuse to be sad

[Pre-Chorus]
Life's too short to waste on stress
Gonna give it my best

[Chorus]
Keep on smiling through the pain
Dancing in the pouring rain
Nothing's gonna bring me down
I'm the happiest fool in town
Hey hey hey!

[Verse 2]
People staring think I'm crazy
Maybe I am maybe maybe
But I'd rather laugh than cry
Live it up before I die

[Chorus]
Keep on smiling through the pain
Dancing in the pouring rain
Nothing's gonna bring me down
I'm the happiest fool in town

[Bridge]

One two three four!

[Outro]
Hey hey hey!
Keep on smiling!
